item.title: What Alcohol Does To Your Body, Brain & Health
item.description: All of the text is converted from a diagram that I made as it’s quite hard to showcase the whole diagram here> All of the text is converted from a diagram that I made as it’s quite hard to showcase the whole diagram here # Even low consumption of alcohol, such as 1 drink per day (or 5-7 a week) has been shown to cause thinning of neocortex and other brain regions.
